mapper.select: select a.*, b.photoName from business a , photo b where a.businessId = b. businessId group by businessId order by businessId desc, businessLicense asc
mapper.insert: insert into business ( businessLicense, businessName, businessTel, businessInfo, businessTime, businessAddress, businessMenu, businessBenefit, businessLat, businessLng, userId,businessType,businessGroup) values (#{businessLicense},#{businessName},#{businessTel},#{businessInfo},#{businessTime},#{businessAddress},#{businessMenu},#{businessBenefit},#{businessLat},#{businessLng},#{userId},#{businessType},#{businessGroup})
mapper.select: select * from business where businessName like concat('%',#{businessKeyword},'%')
select * from business where userId = #{userId} group by businessId order by businessId desc
